title: Create a 'Timeline' Graphic
description: For a story that unfolds over a long period, a visuals editor needs to create a timeline graphic to help readers understand the sequence of events.

tasks.description: Read the article and extract a chronological list of key dates and events.
tasks.expected_outcome: A structured list of timeline events is created.

tasks.description: For each event, write a short, concise description.
tasks.expected_outcome: Each timeline entry has a clear explanation.

tasks.description: Use a timeline creation tool to input the dates and descriptions and generate the graphic.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear and professional-looking timeline is produced.
